overview: Amelia hesitantly follows her husbandâ€™s dream of heading west during the 1848 California gold rush. His rash decision to go ahead of the caravan results in his death at the hands of Indians, but Amelia survives. Alone in a wilderness that she never wanted to travel, she must find civilization with virtually no survival skills or supplies.
tagline: The greatest journey is the one within.
title: The Trail
